title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies: TUI-Based Constructivist Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can manipulate physics phenomenon simulations using TUI (Tangible User Interface) and explain relationships between concepts.
Learners can apply TUI interaction design principles based on embodied cognition theory to scientific problem-solving.
Learners can engage in collaborative knowledge-building processes mediated by TUI in a constructivist learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
